abstract: Investors may be betting that BEA Systems will land a higher bid than the one offered by Oracle last week, but several Wall Street analysts have their doubts. Three brokers removed their buy ratings from BEA Systems on Monday, cutting the stock to the equivalent of neutral.
lead_paragraph: Investors may be betting that BEA Systems will land a higher bid than the one offered by Oracle last week, but several Wall Street analysts have their doubts. Three brokers removed their buy ratings from BEA Systems on Monday, cutting the stock to the equivalent of neutral.

headline.main: Bidding War for BEA Doubtful, Analysts Say
